extension_description.message: Hide blocked and muted accounts from X search results.

background_auth_required.message: Please log in to X. Fetch will resume after login.

background_missing_both.message: Open the muted/blocked list pages so API info can be captured.

background_missing_muted.message: Open the muted list page so API info can be captured.

background_missing_blocked.message: Open the blocked list page so API info can be captured.

background_auth_insufficient.message: Missing authentication data. Pausing and will resume after capture.

background_rate_limited.message: Rate limited. Pausing and will resume after some time.
